MXFB.SettingCycleHint: Adds Next/Previous tool actions which cycle through the current layer's configured tools.
MXFB.SettingReset: Reset to first tool on layer change
MXFB.SettingResetHint: Whenever you change layers, automatically select the first tool in that layer's cycle list.
MXFB.SettingPopupHint: When cycling tools, show a small overlay near your mouse that previews the tools in the cycle list.
MXFB.SettingPopupMsHint: Time until the popup finishes collapsing and disappears after you stop cycling.
MXFB.SettingPopupLayerIconHint: Shows the current layer's icon at the start of the cycling popup.
MXFB.SettingPopupAnimateHint: Floaty/elastic fan-out on first press, then collapse timed to finish exactly at the popup delay.
